original_title: Racing Together 1949-2016 A History Of MotoGP
overview: The first full official history of MotoGP from the earliest days to now. From the first World Championship race, through to the Honda vs. MV years, the two-stroke revolution, the vast array of personalities and neon leathers of the 1980s, and the reign of Rossi, all the way to today's stars this is an incredibly exhaustive and detailed production. This exciting and action-packed documentary is packed with facts and information, from which even the most knowledgeable racing fan will learn something new.
title: Racing Together 1949-2016 A History Of MotoGP
